name: Culting: The Balance
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 43 in 72 hours!

Theme: Sacrifices Must Be Made

It's tough to be the leader of a cult, especially a cult who has no problem sacrificing its members for salvation. Choose whether to SPARE or SACRIFICE your cult members to achieve optimal Worship, Love, Money, and Control. Be careful! If you run out of cultists, it's game over because no one wants to run a one-person cult!
